metadata.title: CVE-2023-52450 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:perf/x86/intel/uncore: Fix NULL pointer dereference issue inupi_fill_topology() Get logical socket id instead of physical id indiscover_upi_topology() to avoid out-of-bound access on 'upi =&type->topology[nid][idx];' line that leads to NULL pointer dereference inupi_fill_topology()

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
